message: The bot doesn't know where the wall are excepted when he's just in front of.
The map look like this (http://sxn.im/jXMxsN) where x are the wall, R the bot, S the exit and * the cases where the bot has already been.

Hello, I have a problem to solve. I have a robot which is in an apartment seen from the top. This apartment has an exit known by the bot. My have have to move automatically and the fastest as possible to this exit.
So I'd like to know either anyone have an idea of an algorithm to help the bot to find the exit. My project is in C. Thank you.
It seems to me - as the bot know about nothing - that the best way is to follow a wall until he gets to the exit.
I managed to do something (https://github.com/OyoKooN/Robot) but it's still tricky.
